data.railText: We will be racing over ONE FIT PADDED HURDLES. All bends divided and on an outer line adding the following distances to each race: Race 1 + 102 yards Race 2 + 153 yards Race 3 + 114 yards Races 4, 6 + 60 yards Race 5 + 75 yards Race 7 + 84 yards
data.otherText: Nessie Chanter 07812 202904
data.wateringText: We have applied 35mm of water to the whole track this week and additional in selected areas.

data.weather: 7mm rain last Sunday. Mon, Tues & Weds - Dry and overcast. 0.5mm rain overnight into Thursday. Thurs - dry and overcast, with a breeze during the afternoon. Fri - Dry and overcast, with a breeze in the afternoon. 0.5mm rain overnight into Saturday. Sat - dry and calm, no wind! Dry overnight into Sunday. Cold and bright morning on Sunday, which is set to stay throughout the day. Max temp 11C.
